actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the export of any drug from the United States unless an application for approval of such drug has been obtained under Section 505 of such act.

summary.text: Prohibits the exportation of any drug from the United States unless an application for approval of such drug has been obtained under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the export of any drug from the United States unless an application for approval of such drug has been obtained under Section 505 of such act.
